# Preparation {.unnumbered}

This workshop is an introduction to data analysis with R. We will go through the lessons in 10 hours spread over 5 days (2 hours per day). We will start with the basics of R code, RStudio interface, importing CSV files, the structure of data frames, how to work with factors and dates, how to calculate summary statistics, how to perform univariable and multivariable regression, and a brief introduction to plotting. This workshop does not assume any prior knowledge of R or RStudio or any prior programming experience.


- Workshop design
- Laptop, internet
- Install R, RStudio, tidyverse
